snippet.title: Bloomtown: A Different Story Release Date Trailer - Future Games Show Gamescom 2024
snippet.description:
A narrative-focused trailer for Bloomtown: A Different Story gave viewers an overview of this eerie, turn-based, pixel-animated adventure game. It's coming to PC and consoles in September.

https://www.youtube.com/@FutureGamesShow

#bloomtown #FutureGamesShow #FGS #futuregamesshow2024 #gamescom
